subject: I need your swift response
body:
Greetings, and thanks for your response to my email. I am Mr. Kenneth
Ridings. I work as a senior active officer in control at one of the most
reliable and trusted couriers in the United States of America.

This is a personal email directed to you for you to consider alone. I'd
like for it to remain and be treated as such only. Remember, this
transaction has nothing to do with illegal activities and it's 100% risk
free from any branch of law.

However, I'm glad that you are ready to work with me. I guarantee you that
you will never regret doing this transaction with me. And, This transaction
is risk-free. And please don't worry; I have made the necessary
arrangements to finish this transaction. So, what I need from you now in
your reply email are the following:

(1) Your exact full name (First Name, Middle Name, and Last name)
(2) Your Home Address
(3) Your telephone numbers

I need to Re-harmonize them with our company delivering records. PLEASE
SEND THEM IMMEDIATELY AFTER YOU GET THIS EMAIL.

I am aware of the consequences of this proposal and note everything has
been planned for success. And once again, This transaction is 100% free of
risk. It would be best if you didn't entertain any worries. I'm just
contacting you in desperation out of the circumstances and dilemma of
things going on in our company. Our C.E.O. plans to turn your consignment
box to the U.S. Treasury if someone doesn't come to apply for the claim
within 7 working days. If you choose not to do this transaction with me,
our company C.E.O. will turn your consignment box over to the U.S.
Treasury. The AUTHORITIES will confiscate the Consignment box, and no one
will ever hear about it, and they will keep it between themselves.

Thanks, And remain blessed.

I'm just waiting for your quick reply.
Best Regards
Mr. Kenneth Ridings

subject: Re: I need your swift response
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth Ridings,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this intriguing proposal. I must say, it's not every day that one receives such an email! 

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please explain more about the box you mentioned? What does it contain and why is it so important? Also, how did my name come up in relation to this box?

I'm also interested in understanding more about your role as a senior active officer in control at your courier company. It sounds like a very important position!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Margaret

subject: Re: I need your swift response
body:
Thank you for your quick response to my proposal. As a senior active
officer in my company, I oversee all available items in the storage
facility, such as baggage consignment boxes and more.

Moreover, as I said in my previous email, I told you that I was at the
airport to represent my company for clearance of some oversized items.

In the process, I accidentally encountered the diplomat. We both introduced
ourselves as the senior officers in my company and the storage facility of
all items, baggage consignment boxes, other delivery belongings, etc. The
diplomat contracted me to complete the formality with the U.S Customs and
Law Enforcement for safety to avoid swindling and get the consignment box
deposited in our safe storage warehouse. I am still waiting to hear news or
if someone applied to release the consignment box. to cut the story short.
I went to conduct an X-ray scan without anyone in the company's knowledge.
The report revealed an undisclosed sum of approximately $13.9 Million
United States dollars. However, the consignee did not properly declare the
Contents of the metal consignment box as “MONEY”; instead, it was reported
as a personal effect.

Also, I would like us to transact this as a deal: 70% for you and 30% for
me. As the senior officer of my company, I have all the resources in my
possession to make this work for the consignment box to be delivered. I
have all the necessary resources to make this work for the consignment box
to be delivered to your location within 2 to 3 working days. All I want is
your trust and cooperation. In your next reply, could you provide the
details below?

(1) Your exact full name (First Name, Middle Name, and Last name)
(2) Your Home Address
(3) Your telephone numbers

I need to re-harmonize them with our company's delivery records. PLEASE
SEND THEM IMMEDIATELY AFTER YOU GET THIS EMAIL.

If you choose not to do this transaction with me, our company C.E.O. will
turn your consignment box over to the U.S. Treasury. The AUTHORITIES will
confiscate the Consignment box, and no one will ever hear about it, and
they will keep it between themselves.

Thanks, And remain blessed.

I'm just waiting for your quick reply.
Best Regards
Mr. Kenneth Ridings

subject: Re: I need your swift response
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth Ridings,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's quite an interesting situation you've found yourself in! I must say, it's not every day that one hears about such a discovery.

I'm curious though, how did the consignee manage to declare the contents of the metal box as personal effects instead of money? That seems like quite a significant oversight on their part.

Also, I'm intrigued by your mention of having all the necessary resources to make this work. Could you perhaps elaborate more on what these resources are and how they would be utilized in this process?

As for your request for my personal details, I'm afraid I can't provide them at this time. However, I am interested in continuing our conversation and learning more about this unique situation.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Margaret
